Package LogisticCompany.App

Class LogisticCompanyApp

java.lang.Object
LogisticCompany.App.LogisticCompanyApp
public class LogisticCompanyApp
extends java.lang.Object
This class represents the business logic associated with the Logistic Company APP application. This is the facade object of the program
